title: Щоденники Темного
overview: Events take place in the fantastic city of Dark. Vampires, werewolves, and other creatures live in it. Everything lives and breathes here, even the walls of houses. To get into this mysterious city is not at all difficult, but to leave is incredibly difficult. Once a journalist arrives in the city. His task is to cover the events taking place in the Dark. However, everything is complicated by the fact that to distinguish where the truth is, and where only hallucinations, in the city is incredibly difficult. In each issue, he investigates new mystical affairs.
